---
name: Security analysis
about: Threat model critique, attack scenarios, or cryptographic security review
title: "[security] "
labels: ["security"]
assignees: ""
---

## Summary
What is the finding or question?

## Scope
What is affected?
- `manual_spec`
- `software_spec`
- test vectors
- whitepaper
- research experiments

## Details
- Threat model assumptions involved
- Attack scenario description
- Impact (what breaks, what changes)

## Reproduction / evidence
If applicable:
- Worked example
- Pseudocode
- References (papers/standards)

## Proposed mitigation
If you have one, describe it.

## Disclosure note
If this is a vulnerability that could endanger users, please do not post sensitive details publicly. See `SECURITY.md`.
